chat.msg: alright! i'm at the starting point, next to a path leading to a twig
awesome! i'm at the twig, next to the small island with the tiger
got it! so, if i take a left from the tiger and cross the islands, i should reach the big island with the elephant, right?
done, i'm now by the elephant
i'll need to go southeast of the parrot to the 3 rocks, from there i'll reach the island with the frog, right?
alright! i'm chillin' with the frog now
all right! just a few hops to the left and i'm now with the crocodile!
ok, so if i go left from the crocodile, i'll be back with the elephant, and then west of the elephant will take me to the giraffe, right?
okay, made it to the giraffe! what's the next move?
gotcha! if i head southeast from the giraffe, i'll run into the snake, right?
nice! now i'm staring at a snake
so, if i take 2 steps east from the snake, i should find the treasure, correct?
woohoo! found the treasure! *finished* thanks for the directions, friend!
that's been fun, right? until our next adventure!
hi there! que comience el juego!!
perfecto! vamos a empezar. primero, da unos pasos a la izquierda, por debajo de un banco de madera, y cruza un sendero hacia un puesto de flores
sorpresa! no vamos al puesto, gira 180 grados a la izquierda, cruza el sendero de nuevo y vuelve hacia el perro blanco. ¿lo tienes?
¡genial! ahora cruza por encima de la rama, dirígete hacia el sur (hacia abajo en el mapa), hasta que veas otro perro blanco junto a un mantel rojo y blanco de picnic
¡estupendo! ahora ve hacia la izquierda y cruza la estera, toca esa taza con bayas
sigue hacia el oeste, amigo (izquierda en el mapa)
¡bien hecho! ahora verás otra rama de madera que cruza el río al norte, vamos a cruzarla
una vez cruzado el río, verás un arbusto verde, vamos a evitarlo por la derecha y continuar hasta que llegues al puesto de flores
¡excelente! ahora gira a la izquierda, pasa por debajo del puesto de flores y sigue tu camino hasta llegar a un gran puente con dos personas montando en bicicleta
¡muy bien! ahora pásalo y sigue hacia el oeste
pronto verás dos personas mayores sentadas en un banco leyendo periódicos
muy bien, ahora avanza unos pasos hacia el sur (abajo en el mapa), entre las personas mayores y otra rama de madera
¡genial! ahora sigue hacia el este (a la derecha en el mapa) hasta que veas un arbusto verde justo al final de la rama de madera
anda entre la rama y el arbusto
¡excelente! unos pocos pasos más al este y te encontrarás con un lindo ciervo joven
¡bravo, lo hiciste muy bien! ¿te ha gustado el paseo?
¡genial! siempre es divertido explorar nuevos caminos, ¿no te parece? ¡hasta la próxima partida!
hola, q tal? ready to play?
nice, i'm starting out at the tent up north
which direction should i head to first?
gotcha! on my way south, i see a dog next to a fire
anything i should do here or keep heading south?
i see a red mushroom near the fire. what's next?
headed south and saw a blue car
alright i've gone south and i'm at a blue telescope
i can see a wooden house surrounded by rocks. *finished*
hola, q tal? ready to start?
awesome! see that first palm tree to the southwest? head under it, then turn right at the second palm, and sharp left before the third one
great, do you see the brown puppy? go to its left a little bit, then turn slightly left, then make a quick right
good job! now, find the big rock on your left and the small one on your right
just squeeze yourself right between them until you see the ocean. got it?
cool! now tread into the water and do you see that red crab? yeah? awesome! now turn right and follow along the big rock, head west in the water
you're doing amazing. next, go along the third, medium-sized rock then spot the shark in the water
now, make a quick right turn. feel the thrill, pal?
just pass between the medium rock and the blue-yellow-white ball and keep going north
almost there! next, a bit to the left, and head northwest
superb! now, you should see a red tent on your left and a big speaker on your right
just wiggle yourself right between them
fantastic! now, i want you to circle the tent, make an arc around it
awesome! now, head southwards towards the shore, but avoid getting your shoes wet this time
make a right turn when you see the red kayak
perfect! now, make a sharp right turn, head north and stick close to the kayak
atta boy! you've reached our final stop, the small green bush
awesome, you did great! thanks for playing along

general_survey.answer: It allows communication flexibility and learning opportunity.
general_survey.question: Any final comments about your partner’s language switching?

general_survey.answer: Learning multiple languages has been a journey of lifelong learning for me. It's beautiful.
